item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades Johnson & Johnson, sees upside on robust drug pipeline
item.description: Morgan Stanley's price target implies that shares of Johnson & Johnson could rise another 17%.

item.title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 jumped to a fresh all-time high and closed at a record on Tuesday.

item.title: What investors piling into gold and silver can learn from King Henry VIII
item.description: A Deutsche Bank analyst argues those betting on the “debasement trade” may be operating from a faulty premise.

item.title: This energy ETF is set to break through a key level, charts show. Two ways to play the trend
item.description: The State Street Energy Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLE) is poised to break through a resistance level of $50, the charts suggest.

item.title: Your income-generating investments could create a tax bill. How to prepare for the season
item.description: The tax-filing season officially kicked off on Monday. Investors should watch their mailboxes for key documents they'll need to complete their returns...
